sect1.para: : At initial the package is cloned from the repository

You can execute the process with the command: roslaunch rt2_assignment1 sim.launch

sect1.title: Our package consist of four nodes
go_to_point:
sect1.para: go_to_point node will implements a service to start or stop the robot towards a point in the environment.And the service implemented in this node would be able to drive the robot towards a certain position in space of (x,y) and with a certain angle (theta) and the action server is included.

sect1.title: user_interface:
sect1.para: User interface node is to control the robot with the attributes start and stop and calls the service implemented in the state_machine node.

sect1.title: position_service:
sect1.para: The node PositionServer, which implements a random Position Server.And the service implemented in this node will gives the random values for x,y and theta in which the the values of x and y should be limited between min and max value.

sect1.title: state_machine:
sect1.para: state_machine node implements a service to start or stop the robot and call the other two service to drive the robot.
